alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Davidson County through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle Meade, or 7 miles west of Nashville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaman Park, Bells Bend and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 201 and 207. Interstate 65 near mile marker 85, and between mile markers 88 and 90. Interstate 24 between mile markers 43 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
